title: UV Water treatment system
summary: UV water system used to treat water for feeding livestock or to irrigate horticultural crops.

eligible.eligibleBullet01: be a UV water system used to treat water for feeding livestock or to irrigate horticultural crops
eligible.eligibleBullet02: have a single bulb in-line UV filter
eligible.eligibleBullet03: have automatic shut off of the water supply when power or bulb failure occurs
eligible.eligibleBullet04: treat at least 30L per minute at 30mJ/cm2 (for example 55 watt power consumption)
eligible.eligibleBullet05: be Water Regulations Advisory Scheme (WRAS) approved
eligible.eligibleText01: You can apply for up to 10 UV water treatment system items per application.
